attributes.description: The value of the identity. This will usually take the form of a small structure of strings.
attributes.name: description

functions.meaning: Purpose of identity, e.g. legal ,  stage name,  nickname,  tribal name,  trading name. Taken from value of inherited `_name_` attribute.
functions.name: purpose

meta_info.description: An identity  of a Social entity, such as a person name or company name, and which is used by the party to identify itself. Actual structure is archetyped.
meta_info.name: PARTY_IDENTITY
